backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, posts, caves, invites, and authorization with storage and helper modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style sheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React root and loading main.tsx with app metadata and icon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, authentication gating, theme provider, and profile-setup modal.
frontend/src/components/caves/CaveInvite: UI panel for generating cave invite links, creating tokens, showing results, and copying links to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/caves/CreateCave: Dialog for creating a new cave with name input, validation, and submission via useCreateCave hook.
frontend/src/components/caves/MessageCom: Form for typing and sending cave messages, handling enter-to-submit and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Top navigation bar with links, share action, and logout handling.
Layout wrapper providing global background, nav bar, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPicke: File picker for images/videos with validation, preview, and clear support.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaRende: Renders an image or video blob by inferring media type from its URL.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a single post with author info, content, timestamp, and optional media.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCompos: Form for creating posts with text and optional media upload via ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Editable form for updating the user's display name and saving profile changes.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Onboarding modal requiring the user to set an initial display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar using profile image or derived initials.
frontend/src/components/state/EmptyState: Generic empty-state component with icon, message, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/state/ErrorState: Destructive alert displaying a normalized error message.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Skeleton loader rendering post, cave, or message placeholders based on type.
frontend/src/constants/media.ts: Defines allowed image/video MIME types, max file size limits, and helper functions to validate media files.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for profiles, feed posts, caves, and messaging with mutations and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CaveChatPage.tsx: Displays a cave’s messages, members, and message composer with real-time updates and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/CavesListPage.tsx: Shows the list of caves with message/member counts and supports creating and navigating to caves.
frontend/src/pages/ComposePostPage.tsx: Renders the post composition UI inside a centered layout.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the post feed with loading/error states and navigation to create new posts.
frontend/src/pages/JoinCavePage.tsx: Handles joining a cave using an invite token and displays loading, success, or error states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single post including author info, content, and media, with navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the logged-in user's profile, profile editor, and a list of their posts.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Provides a styled sign‑in screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/utils/appShareLink.ts: Generates the app's shareable URL and provides a function to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error messages into user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/inviteLinks.ts: Builds invite URLs and includes a clipboard copy helper with fallback support.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps for posts and messages into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across hash and standard routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, plugins, colors, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project-wide state file describing the app template, its current version, and a list of existing ICP full‑stack features including auth, storage, invites, caves, chat, posts, profiles, navigation, and scaffolding.
